title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 29.6 - Retention of operational costs by state
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 29.6 - Retention of operational costs by state

State Regulations
(a) All county tax monies collected in
issuing offices of DMV in any calendar month, less collection and
administrative costs for such transactions, will be distributed to the
appropriate fiscal officer of the county by the end of the following month by
the State Comptroller, upon certification from the commissioner. (b) The collection and administrative costs
incurred by DMV and its agents, deducted from the monthly distributions to be
made to the county, will be determined on a per transaction basis subject to
change as costs change. They will be certified from time to time by the
commissioner. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15
ยง
29.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
